text: The 1988–89 McNeese State Cowboys basketball team represented the McNeese State University during the 1988–89 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Cowboys, led by head coach Steve Welch, played their home games at Burton Coliseum and were members of the Southland Conference. They finished the season with a record of 16–14, 9–5 in Southland play. They won the 1989 Southland Conference Men's Basketball Tournament to earn an automatic bid in the 1989 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament as No. 16 seed in the Midwest region. They lost in the first round to No. 1 seed Illinois, 77–71. ==Roster== ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9| Regular season |- !colspan=9| Southland Tournament |- !colspan=9| NCAA Tournament ==References== McNeese State McNeese State McNeese State Cowboys basketball team McNeese State Cowboys basketball team Category:McNeese State Cowboys basketball seasons
